subject: Partnership opportunity for Simsonn
description_text:
I came across Simsonn  and would like to contact you with an idea for a
partnership based solely on commission. Are you open to hearing how it can
help your store grow?

conversations.body_text: I am glad to hear your opinion.

Thank you for being open to hearing my idea. Below is a concise proposal
outlining how our commission-based partnership could help Simsonn attract
more customers and boost sales with no upfront cost or financial risk to
you.

1. Partnership Structure

Model: 100% commission-based  you only pay when I bring in actual sales.

Commission Rate: [Insert % or flat fee] per confirmed sale.

Payment Terms: [e.g., Monthly payout after order completion].

2. How It Works

Promotion: I will promote your store’s products through [methods: social
media campaigns, targeted outreach, content marketing, affiliate networks,
etc.].

Customer Acquisition: I will drive qualified traffic to your store using
tailored marketing strategies.

Sales Tracking: All leads and conversions will be tracked through
[affiliate tracking link, unique coupon codes, or referral system].

Commission Payment: You pay only for verified sales generated through my
efforts.

3. Benefits for Simsonn

Zero Upfront Cost: No risk you only pay after you’ve earned revenue.

Increased Reach: Tap into new customer segments without extra advertising
spend.

Performance-Based: I’m fully motivated to deliver measurable results.

Flexible & Scalable: Partnership can be expanded as sales grow.

4. Next Steps

If this sounds promising, I suggest a quick [15-minute call / email
exchange] to:

Agree on the commission percentage

Define tracking and reporting methods

Set a trial period to measure results

Looking forward to helping Simsonn grow at no cost until you see real sales.

On Fri, Aug 15, 2025 at 3:03 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi eesha Virtuous,        You can take a look at our Affiliate Program.  https://www.simsonn.com/pages/affiliate-program
